name: Invasion of the Soft Shelled Sweet Stealers!!!
name_original: Invasion of the Soft Shelled Sweet Stealers!!!
description:
A short W-I-P take on the arcade classic Space Invaders developed by @hex_init && @riotjayne for the 'Make a Game Club - Follow A Tutorial' Jam hosted by @swagshaw. Tutorial series used can be found here. This is an early build and may have development errors, and hopefully will be expanded in the near future. 

Game build is up go get the caNDy!!
